sources.name: Broader pyramid workforce strategy — AI enables entry-level workers to do higher-value work
sources.notes: Broader pyramid workforce strategy — AI enables entry-level workers to do higher-value work

summary: Three-unit AI go-to-market reorganization: Cognizant has reorganized its go-to-market operations into three distinct AI-focused units: (1) Market-facing AI teams, (2) Integrated AI solutions unit, (3) Centralized AI platforms and products unit Three-vector AI strategy with agentic software and digital labor: CEO Ravi Kumar outlined a three-vector strategy: Vector One augments traditional software delivery with AI; Vectors Two and Three build new agentic software cycles and 'digital labor.' Company has 4,0 Broader pyramid workforce strategy — AI enables entry-level workers to do higher-value work: CEO Ravi Kumar described a 'broader pyramid' workforce strategy. Plans to hire 24,000-25,000 freshers in 2026. AI allows high-value technical work to be moved to entry-level roles. Combined with pyram Strategic partnerships with NVIDIA and Anthropic: Cognizant maintains strategic partnerships with NVIDIA and Anthropic to support AI capabilities, along with its proprietary BASIS framework and 'science of context engineering.'
